invocations.description: Returns the item in your belt slot. If you need more info about the item data structure, access this.
invocations.ex:
auto(200)
if $belt.count < 10 then
	equipitem($belt.id, 'belt') wait(300, 500)
end
invocations.exDescription: Will refill your ammo if you have less than 10 units on the belt slot.
